text: love this post by @holly_cummins so much. so wise, so well-written, so evocative, so darned real. if you read one holiday focused tech blog post this year make it this one https://t.co/GCgGGVdOYm

author.description: redmonk co-founder, sunshine in a bag, industry analyst loves developers, "motivating in a surreal kind of way". came up with "progressive delivery". he/him
author.name: Stiff Peaks Eggnog also @monkchips@mastodon.social
